title: International Criminal Court judges issue arrest warrants against Commander of the Long-Range Aviation of the Russian Air For...
content: International Criminal Court judges issue arrest warrants against Commander of the Long-Range Aviation of the Russian Air Forces Sergei Kobylash and the Commander of the Black Sea Fleet Viktor Sokolov for alleged crimes committed from at least 10 October 2022 until at least 9 March 2023
author: Live UA Map
